title: information service
extract: An Information Service is a service, which provides (serves) data/knowledge/information somehow. However, this definition is not strong enough to describe the range and domain of an Information Service. Therefore, it is necessary to define the term Information Service in a specific context.Jun 23, 2010
extract_html: An Information Service is a service, which provides (serves) data/knowledge/information somehow.
